extendedInfo.description: IGN âââ Editor's Choice âââ Â "It has style, replayability and room to grow. In short - it's a steal, man. You dig?. 9/10 AMAZING!"148apps.com âââ Editor's Choice âââ Â "Funky Smugglers has style. It has funk. It has all the hallmarks of an addictive arcade action game with a great tune behind it." 9/10AppSpy"Funky Smugglers is slick, fun, and fresh - everything you could want for your iDevice when you only have a few minutes spare. Verdict: Great!" 5/5FUNKY SMUGGLERS COMBINES AWESOME 70S ATMOSPHERE WITH MASSIVE MULTIPLAYER EVENTS FOR ENDLESS ARCADE FUN!Some of the things smugglers try to get through the airport are incredible. There's a spider in grandma's suitcase?! A racketeer is hiding a plunger?! Holy smoke! Luckily, you have an X-Ray scanner to check their clothes and luggage for wacky contraband. Enjoy a funky 70s-style soundtrack while keeping the airport safe from hammers, scissors, and other illegal goods in a game full of groovy arcade craziness.Join huge Team Battles where you fight for high scores! Dive into challenging randomized missions! Use multi-touch or a one-finger slide to pick up multiple items and chain together combos! Boost your X-ray! Earn in-game cash to spend on customization, new contraband, new smugglers and exciting upgrades!Funky Smugglers features:â¢ An X-ray scanner that allows you to see what the smugglers donât want you to see â¢ Test your arcade skills in massive Team Battles and challenging single player missions â¢ The spirit of 70s brought with funky music tracks â¢ Boosts to power up your X-ray scanner â¢ Ranks based on your overall progress â¢ Outsmart shifty smugglers by grabbing the contraband â pick many items with one swipe or multitouch to make uber-multiple combos in finger-twisting arcade-style gameplay â¢ Quality design from award-winning developer â¢ Visuals optimized for most powerful Android devices

reviews.title: Defineatly worth it!
reviews.comment: It\'s great fun with a amazing, funky soundtrack. Love it!
reviews.author: Mat\304\253ss Ma\304\215ul\304\201ns

reviews.title: Broken on Galaxy Tab 2
reviews.comment: Was loving this game until my GT2 was updated. Graphic glitching makes the game completely unplayable. I\'ve tried everything I can think of. Even uninstalling and reinstalling. If your on a Galaxy tablet you\'ll probably want to skip this game for now.
reviews.author: Mike Mathews

reviews.title: Was good...
reviews.comment: Game was simple, short fun with awesome music and graphics. Now something has happened with all 11 bit games (including anomaly) where the graphics have become a flickering mess. Games are now unplayable on droid razr even after reinstalling.
reviews.author: Matthew Noah Ward

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This game is fantastic and it\'s a lot of fun, but you guys should have an option so that the new passengers you can buy, get mixed in with the current passengers instead of replacing them :)  it would also be cool if you could enable more than one item pack, so different things randomly get mixed in. In my opinion these would be fantastic additions, but the game is amazing as is!
reviews.author: Joseph Padilla

reviews.title: Silky smooth arcade fun!
reviews.comment: Silky smooth graphics and gameplay. Great soundtrack and style. Everything you want in an arcade game; five stars!
reviews.author: Greg Resler

reviews.title: Good concept...
reviews.comment: but not quite as fun as Fruit Ninja, and the lack of responsiveness to touch - at least on my TF700 - is frustrating.
reviews.author: Josh Levinson

reviews.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD ON GALAXY TAB!!!!!
reviews.comment: Horrible screen glitch makes game unplayable!  Wish I could get money back, or punch devs in face, either would be acceptable.
reviews.author: Vincent Good

reviews.title: Graphics Glitch = Terrible
reviews.comment: I love the soundtrack and the two teams that compete to win. Fun game!
reviews.author: Reanin Renee

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: Bought the game took so long to instal I cant get a refund wont plat on my samsung tab 2 ..... glitches everywhere .. can I getva refund or a fix at least I realy want to play it
reviews.author: Justin Wheeler

reviews.title: Repetitious, unresponsive
reviews.comment: Great visual design, poor play design.
reviews.author: Benjamin Wheeler

reviews.title: Glitchy graphics still not fixed!
reviews.comment: Corrupted graphics = unplayable on Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 after Jelly Bean update. I really like this game. It\'s definitely deserving of 5 stars. Unfortunately, after my SGT2 10.1 got the Jelly Bean update, the graphics became super glitchy, rendering the game unplayable. I emailed the dev, got no response or acknowledgement, no updates for a month now, no mention in the game description above. I cleared data, uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail. Come on, guys, I wanna play this game again!  Edit: Installed update, still fubarred. :(.  Edit 2/25/13: Installed the new update & cleared data, STILL fubarred, and STILL no acknowledgement of the problems. I\'ve now removed all the stars I can. That\'s how much I want to play the game again -- I\'m still updating this review. Won\'t be long till I become irate...
reviews.author: Sushi Shibata

reviews.title: IMPORTANT FOR JELLYBEAN DEVICES!!!READ!!!
reviews.comment: My RAZR just recently updated to Jellybean and the game now has graphic glitches and is unplayable. Seems that it can\'t run smoothly on any jellybean devices. Stay away if you have Android 4.1 or higher until fixed. Update and it will be a definite 5 stars.
reviews.author: Adam Corela

reviews.title: Controls not working
reviews.comment: Touch controls are not fully working. Many time I lost game because this problem
reviews.author: varun goyal

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Everything is going right but i dont know how to exit from this app!!so give it four star.sometimes i close it by task manager.please tell me how to close it.
reviews.author: Deepak Joshi

reviews.title: Super Glitchy!!! STILL!!!!
reviews.comment: I bought this game months ago...and I still cant play it!!! I would either like it fixed...or I would like a refund! There are glitches when playing it on the Samsung Galaxy 2....surely someone over there can work out the kinks!!!
reviews.author: Bryan Collins

reviews.title: Refund
reviews.comment: I just bought wont open please fix.. or give me the money back stop ripping people off

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: It\'s got style and all but it\'s just not that fun. It gets boring very quickly.

reviews.comment: Favorite pick up and play!

reviews.comment: Too hard to earn money
